GT.content: equivalence of taken & given is posed, thematized; the exemplarity of God (Maru) giving as much as he takes; tribe restores, restitutes equilibrium by following example
GT.linkedContent: equivalence of taken & given is posed, thematized; the exemplarity of God (Maru) giving as much as he takes; tribe restores, restitutes equilibrium by following example

GT.content: not through w/ this logic, one is never through w/ it
GT.linkedContent: not through w/ this logic, one is never through w/ it

FL.content: foundation is a promise, ever positing pro-met even if promise is not kept, iterability inscribes the promise as guard in the most irruptive instant of foundation, inscribes the possibility of repetition at the heart of the originary, so there is no real distinction between preserving violence and founding, positing is always a call for preserving: differential contamination
FL.linkedContent: foundation is a promise, ever positing pro-met even if promise is not kept, iterability inscribes the promise as guard in the most irruptive instant of foundation, inscribes the possibility of repetition at the heart of the originary, so there is no real distinction between preserving violence and founding, positing is always a call for preserving: differential contamination

SPOM.content: a justice beyond the economy of repression, not distributive, not calculable equality, outside of the economy of vengeance, incalculability of the gift and singularity, the an-economic ex-position to others
SPOM.linkedContent: a justice beyond the economy of repression, not distributive, not calculable equality, outside of the economy of vengeance, incalculability of the gift and singularity, the an-economic ex-position to others

SPOM.content: spectral effect, for Marx, a dialectical position (Setzung) of the ghostly body as body proper > where Stirner sees 1st moment as spectral and 2nd as successful, interiorization, subjectivation (plus de vie) Marx sees a hyperbolic surplus of spectrality (plus de mort)
SPOM.linkedContent: spectral effect, for Marx, a dialectical position (Setzung) of the ghostly body as body proper > where Stirner sees 1st moment as spectral and 2nd as successful, interiorization, subjectivation (plus de vie) Marx sees a hyperbolic surplus of spectrality (plus de mort)

HASD.content: homology btwn secret group (topography of social link) and the place of the secret (beyond all position)
HASD.linkedContent: homology btwn secret group (topography of social link) and the place of the secret (beyond all position)

MPM.content: the undecidable that resists non-dialectizable oppositions will bear name, maintain rhetorical relation w/ opposition, will have figure of opposition, be figurable, will always let itself by parasited by figure of opposition [thus staging of promise as act or position]
MPM.linkedContent: the undecidable that resists non-dialectizable oppositions will bear name, maintain rhetorical relation w/ opposition, will have figure of opposition, be figurable, will always let itself by parasited by figure of opposition [thus staging of promise as act or position]

OH.content: word “avant-garde” [see pp. 25, 48-50]: capitalizes on figurehead, phallic point, advanced initiative of guarding, anticipating to conserve, thus “avant-garde position”
OH.linkedContent: word “avant-garde” [see pp. 25, 48-50]: capitalizes on figurehead, phallic point, advanced initiative of guarding, anticipating to conserve, thus “avant-garde position”

S.content: Descartes’ cogito not exemplary precedent of existential analytic because sum is not questioned [leap rather than genealogy]; Descartes commits the thingification of the subject, positing (Ansatz) of subjectum or hypokeimenon, a substance or substratum
S.linkedContent: Descartes’ cogito not exemplary precedent of existential analytic because sum is not questioned [leap rather than genealogy]; Descartes commits the thingification of the subject, positing (Ansatz) of subjectum or hypokeimenon, a substance or substratum

POS.content: double, interval, biphase, biface, bifurcated writing can only be marked in a grouped textual field, not in a punctual position, not w/ a single author
POS.linkedContent: double, interval, biphase, biface, bifurcated writing can only be marked in a grouped textual field, not in a punctual position, not w/ a single author

POS.content: there’s a general text, an overflow, everywhere a discourse and its order (essence, meaning, ideality, consciousness) is put back into position of mark in a chain that this authorizing discourse believes it governs (and it does [?])
POS.linkedContent: there’s a general text, an overflow, everywhere a discourse and its order (essence, meaning, ideality, consciousness) is put back into position of mark in a chain that this authorizing discourse believes it governs (and it does [?])

POS.content: dissemination puts at stake (play) castration’s position as transcendental signifier/signified (phallus, transcendental signifier, as correlate to primary signified, mother’s desire)
POS.linkedContent: dissemination puts at stake (play) castration’s position as transcendental signifier/signified (phallus, transcendental signifier, as correlate to primary signified, mother’s desire)

POS.content: nothing surprising to philosophy about taking positions, can’t we leave the question of position open; positions: scenes, acts, figures of dissemination; position-of-the-other, in Hegel, to pose oneself by oneself as other of the Idea, other than oneself—one’s finite determination
POS.linkedContent: nothing surprising to philosophy about taking positions, can’t we leave the question of position open; positions: scenes, acts, figures of dissemination; position-of-the-other, in Hegel, to pose oneself by oneself as other of the Idea, other than oneself—one’s finite determination

P.content: art: domesticated in this history of truth, onto-encyclopedic economy, the machinery of the pose (Setzung/Entgegensetzung)
P.linkedContent: art: domesticated in this history of truth, onto-encyclopedic economy, the machinery of the pose (Setzung/Entgegensetzung)

ROP.content: no analytic position once resistance is not identifiable
ROP.linkedContent: no analytic position once resistance is not identifiable

ROP.content: “I’ve never much liked” theses, positions, position takings, positionings > for those waiting for my position, so they can decide, “good luck”
ROP.linkedContent: “I’ve never much liked” theses, positions, position takings, positionings > for those waiting for my position, so they can decide, “good luck”

PS.content: Derrida on how the question he posed (like throwing a net around entire textual network) forced the substitution of discourse for the punctuality of the position
PS.linkedContent: Derrida on how the question he posed (like throwing a net around entire textual network) forced the substitution of discourse for the punctuality of the position

WAP.content: pose questions, pose or posit that which does not pose or posit itself, not-thetic? this alleged neutrality constructs teaching body > no question not constrained by a program
WAP.linkedContent: pose questions, pose or posit that which does not pose or posit itself, not-thetic? this alleged neutrality constructs teaching body > no question not constrained by a program

C.content: a paradigm that is posed as if always there (theme, then, thesis)
C.linkedContent: a paradigm that is posed as if always there (theme, then, thesis)

BSi.content: political contract, a prosthesis, nomos as thesis (opposed to physis), convention, positing
BSi.linkedContent: political contract, a prosthesis, nomos as thesis (opposed to physis), convention, positing

BSi.content: if bêtise is proper to man, autopositing the proper is stupidity itself
BSi.linkedContent: if bêtise is proper to man, autopositing the proper is stupidity itself

BSi.content: pitiless lucidity of cogito, triumph of conscious self-positing self, the thesis of self always reflects itself as bêtise, bêtise always triumphs > Triumph of Life in bêtise ——bêtise always on side of victor > bêtise must not find itself bête: that would be suicidal
BSi.linkedContent: pitiless lucidity of cogito, triumph of conscious self-positing self, the thesis of self always reflects itself as bêtise, bêtise always triumphs > Triumph of Life in bêtise ——bêtise always on side of victor > bêtise must not find itself bête: that would be suicidal

BSi.content: bêtise as self-positing, positivism, positivity itself, across all 3 modes (question, affirmation, negation) > but affirmation, the “yes,’”is not to be reduced to positivity [?]
BSi.linkedContent: bêtise as self-positing, positivism, positivity itself, across all 3 modes (question, affirmation, negation) > but affirmation, the “yes,’”is not to be reduced to positivity [?]

EU.content: challenge to translation of series Bild, bilden, Bildung (image, form, formation, culture); translation of Übersetzung loses positional dimension of setzen
EU.linkedContent: challenge to translation of series Bild, bilden, Bildung (image, form, formation, culture); translation of Übersetzung loses positional dimension of setzen

SPEC.content: instead of “logic”—issue is to rebind (relier), by means of analysis, notions of lien, stricture, desmos, question of life death to that of position (Setzung, thesis, theme) [this functions as a supplementary “judas” from Glas, re: an incision tattooed btwn pages 270/272]
SPEC.linkedContent: instead of “logic”—issue is to rebind (relier), by means of analysis, notions of lien, stricture, desmos, question of life death to that of position (Setzung, thesis, theme) [this functions as a supplementary “judas” from Glas, re: an incision tattooed btwn pages 270/272]

SPEC.content: logic of au-delà, pas au-delà: overflows logic of position, not a substitute/replacement/opposition to/for position, opening another relation, rapport sans rapport, frees itself at a stroke (coup), neither pas nor coup is indivisible
SPEC.linkedContent: logic of au-delà, pas au-delà: overflows logic of position, not a substitute/replacement/opposition to/for position, opening another relation, rapport sans rapport, frees itself at a stroke (coup), neither pas nor coup is indivisible

SPEC.content: [re: Freud’s speculation, a logic beyond that of position] the “position’s” fall (chute) would cause bankruptcy, ruin, discredit: today I’ll speak of speculation, I’m betting I will
SPEC.linkedContent: [re: Freud’s speculation, a logic beyond that of position] the “position’s” fall (chute) would cause bankruptcy, ruin, discredit: today I’ll speak of speculation, I’m betting I will

SPEC.content: the secondary (supplementary stricture) transforms freely mobile into immobile cathectic energy: posits, posts—here’s a thesis: immobilized cathexis is more tonic, tonicity related to effects of binding (elasticity & tension), thus binden as bander (erection): “bander: poster, liason: postale”
SPEC.linkedContent: the secondary (supplementary stricture) transforms freely mobile into immobile cathectic energy: posits, posts—here’s a thesis: immobilized cathexis is more tonic, tonicity related to effects of binding (elasticity & tension), thus binden as bander (erection): “bander: poster, liason: postale”

FV.content: for Lacan, signifier’s materiality (not empirical) due to certain indivisibility and locality (found where it isn’t) > indivisibility & locality are indissociable—rivet us (nous river), make us arrive at that which properly links singular to signature: guarantee of unity of signifier
FV.linkedContent: for Lacan, signifier’s materiality (not empirical) due to certain indivisibility and locality (found where it isn’t) > indivisibility & locality are indissociable—rivet us (nous river), make us arrive at that which properly links singular to signature: guarantee of unity of signifier

FV.content: even when letter arrives, its capacity not to arrive torments it, affects “subject,” “character,” “position” [w/ divisibility]
FV.linkedContent: even when letter arrives, its capacity not to arrive torments it, affects “subject,” “character,” “position” [w/ divisibility]

FV.content: “positional”: difference determined as opposition, whether or not dialectically
FV.linkedContent: “positional”: difference determined as opposition, whether or not dialectically
